name: flowfit
description: Gamified fitness with crypto rewards on Flow blockchain

scripts.build: npm run build:frontend && npm run build:backend
scripts.deploy:testnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network flow-testnet
scripts.deploy:mainnet: cd contracts && npx hardhat run scripts/deploy.js --network flow-mainnet
scripts.setup: npm install && cd frontend && npm install && cd ../backend && npm install && cd ../contracts && npm install

author: FlowFit Team
